msContents.summary: Author invites members of the National League of Republican Colored Women to a conference in Washington D. C..

objectDesc.p: A single page typewritten letter from Namme H. Burroughs, written on 2/9/1929.

opener.salute: My dear Associateassociate in a Greatgreat Causecause:

body.p:
I am hereby calling a conference of all
members of the National League of Republican Colored Women
to meet in conference at 1115 Rhode Island Avenue, North
west, Washington, D. C., Tuesday, March fifth, at 11: A. M.

Matters of vital importance affecting our
political interests for the next four years will be discuss
ed and a program of action mapped out.

I am sure you are planning to attend the
Inauguration. As your Presidentpresident, as a member of the Inau
guration Committee, and as your friend I shall be very glad
to do anything that I can, officially or personally, that
will add to your pleasure and comfort while you are in the
city.

If you have not arranged for your stopping
place, I shall be very glad to do what I can to secure comfort
able, convenient quarters for you and the friends who might
be in your party.
body.closer:
Nannie H. Burroughs m.
President, National League of
Republican Colored Women
